content: giddy up created by lisa overby a simple triangle kerchief knit in our berkley base a 100% cashmere yarn that is delightful to wear © 2024 yarn twisters 1 giddy up materials & info abbreviations yarn 1 skein yarn twisters berkley 210 bobble - bind off yards/50g 100% cashmere or any fingering weight yarn co - cast on sample knit in colourway cherry k - knit gauge 20 sts by 24 row equals 4 by 4 in 6 kfb - knit front back knit into the front of the row pattern repeat before blocking stitch leaving on the left-hand needle knit into the back of the same stitch dropping the needles 3 5 mm us 4 needle or size stitch off the left-hand needle 1 stitch needed to obtain gauge increased notions removable stitch marker optional to k2tog - knit 2 together insert needle into the next 2 sts knit the 2 sts together as one 1 st mark the right side of the work darning decreased needle rhn - right hand needle finished size centre depth 13 33cm wingspan 41 104cm sl - slip notes st/sts - stitch/stitches link to picture tutorial for yarn over bind off wyif - with yarn if front method yo - yarnover 1 st increased https //nimble-needles com/stitches/how-to- knit-the-yarn-over-bind-off/ pattern instructions co 3 sts row 6 as row 2 row 7 to 126 repeat row 1 to 6 twenty set up more times 137 sts row 1 kfb kfb sl1 wyif 5 sts row 2 k to last st sl1 wyif bobble all sts using a stretchy bind off method of row 3 kfb k to last 2 sts kfb sl1 wyif 7 sts your choice row 4 as row 2 row 5 to 8 repeat row 3 and 4 two more the sample uses the yarn over bind off times 11 sts method see link to picture tutorial in notes main pattern k2 *pass the second st over the first st on the row 1 kfb *k2tog yo * repeat ** to last 2 sts rhn same as a normal bobble yo pass the kfb sl1 wyif 2 sts increased new second st over the yo just created k1* row 2 k to last st sl1 wyif row 3 kfb k to last 2 sts kfb sl1 wyif 2 sts repeat ** until you have 2 sts remaining pass increased the second st of the first st on the rhn cut row 4 as row 2 yarn pull up through st weave in your ends row 5 as row 3 2 sts increased and block piece to measurements © 2024 yarn twisters 2 giddy up
